text: The XI Aysén Region () is one of the fifteen regions of Chile. It has four provinces. The capital city of the region is Coyhaique. Other towns are Puerto Cisnes and Río Ibáñez. == Provinces of the region == * Province of Coyhaique: capital Coyhaique. * Province of General Carrera: capital Chile Chico. * Province of Aysén: capital Puerto Aysén. * Province of Capitán Prat: capital Cochrane
title: Aysén Region
